title: General Chemistry 1: for Senior High School (Specialized Subject for STEM strand)
author: Charry Vida R. Cervantes, Reynald D. Dizon
description: A senior high school chemistry textbook covering foundational concepts in general chemistry: matter and its properties, measurements, atomic structure, chemical bonding, stoichiometry, gases, electronic structure, periodicity, and introductory organic compounds — based on the K–12 STEM curriculum. 168 pages. Published by Lorimar Publishing, Inc.
